lead_paragraph: Russian whistleblower Yulia Stepanova will not appeal against her ban from the Rio Olympics, saying on Friday she was "hugely sad and heartbroken" that the IOC had not supported her and used its discretion to allow her to run as an independent athlete.

headline.print_headline: Russian Stepanova Will Not Appeal Over Rio Ban
headline.main: Russian Stepanova Will Not Appeal Over Rio Ban
